title: Predict Scientist Rankings
description: How well can machine learning predict the ranking of the most impactful scientists? And can it generate personalised recommendations to improve the rankings?

title: Visualize Amazon Sales
description: An interactive visualization of Amazon sales. Adjust the timeframe and products, and compare different smoothing methods.

title: Statistical Analysis of the Loudness War
description: Using Spotify data of tracks from the last 100 years, this project quantifies the trend in recorded music of losing dynamic range in favour of loudness.

title: Evolution of Linguistic Diversity (In Development)
description: This project explores how words evolve to have multiple meanings over time and how people's sensitivity to word variations affects the way word meanings change.
